title: 求助这个报错是什么原因造成的？
author: 古小枫
txt_content:
[size=0.8]Exception stopping the server[size=0.8]java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: sun.nio.ch.DirectBuffer.cleaner()Ljdk/internal/ref/Cleaner;[size=0.8]at net.minecraft.server.v1_15_R1.RegionFile.lambda$static$3(RegionFile.java:888) ~[Tuinity-1.15.2.jar:git-Tuinity-"0d31eb2"][size=0.8]at net.minecraft.server.v1_15_R1.RegionFile.cleanDirectByteBuffer(RegionFile.java:896) ~[Tuinity-1.15.2.jar:git-Tuinity-"0d31eb2"][size=0.8]at net.minecraft.server.v1_15_R1.RegionFile.close(RegionFile.java:852) ~[Tuinity-1.15.2.jar:git-Tuinity-"0d31eb2"][size=0.8]at net.minecraft.server.v1_15_R1.RegionFileCache.close(RegionFileCache.java:281) ~[Tuinity-1.15.2.jar:git-Tuinity-"0d31eb2"][size=0.8]at net.minecraft.server.v1_15_R1.PlayerChunkMap.close(PlayerChunkMap.java:611) ~[Tuinity-1.15.2.jar:git-Tuinity-"0d31eb2"][size=0.8]at net.minecraft.server.v1_15_R1.ChunkProviderServer.close(ChunkProviderServer.java:701) ~[Tuinity-1.15.2.jar:git-Tuinity-"0d31eb2"][size=0.8]at net.minecraft.server.v1_15_R1.ChunkProviderServer.close(ChunkProviderServer.java:692) ~[Tuinity-1.15.2.jar:git-Tuinity-"0d31eb2"][size=0.8]at net.minecraft.server.v1_15_R1.World.close(World.java:1182) ~[Tuinity-1.15.2.jar:git-Tuinity-"0d31eb2"][size=0.8]at net.minecraft.server.v1_15_R1.MinecraftServer.stop(MinecraftServer.java:774) ~[Tuinity-1.15.2.jar:git-Tuinity-"0d31eb2"][size=0.8]at net.minecraft.server.v1_15_R1.DedicatedServer.stop(DedicatedServer.java:753) ~[Tuinity-1.15.2.jar:git-Tuinity-"0d31eb2"][size=0.8]at net.minecraft.server.v1_15_R1.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:1004) ~[Tuinity-1.15.2.jar:git-Tuinity-"0d31eb2"][size=0.8]at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:748) [?:1.8.0_241]
